programme.title: RV Nation
programme.desc: As with most things, not all recreational vehicles, or RVs, are created equal. Some are modest, no-frills abodes that fulfill their basic function of providing housing for the owners. Others are elaborate, tricked-out vehicles that take the concept of the RV to a whole new level. "RV Nation" takes viewers behind the scenes of the process involved in designing and constructing some of the biggest and most detailed trailers available on the market. The series showcases how companies get the unique motor homes ready for the road.

programme.title: Burn Pile Murder Trial
programme.desc: According to prosecutors in their opening statements, money was the motive for this murder. Next, Melody Farris' defense delivered their opening remarks to the jury. They claimed police acted on confirmation bias when they allegedly narrowed erroneously on the defendant for the death of her husband, Gary. A complicated family coupled with a complicated police investigation all led to fingers pointing at Melody Farris for first-degree murder.

programme.desc: The State in their case for murder against, the defendant, Christopher Gregor brought to the stand the responding officer who arrived at his apartment. It was after six-year-old Corey Micciolo was pronounced dead at the hospital.

programme.title: Treadmill Abuse Murder Trial
programme.desc: The autopsy photos of Corey Micciolo was shown in detail to jurors. The State wanted to present how child abuse and child endangerment by his father, Christopher Gregor, physically led to his death.

programme.title: Treadmill Abuse Murder Trial
programme.desc: Cross-Examination began on the crime scene Investigator Who processed Christopher Gregor's apartment. Detectives immediately turned their attention there when Corey Micciolo was pronounced dead at the hospital and his father ran out of town.

programme.title: Treadmill Abuse Murder Trial
programme.desc: The triage nurse who assessed Corey Micciolo shortly before he died testified. This nurse observed Corey's poor, life-threatening condition in the emergency room. He remembered Corey's last breaths recalling how traumatic it was to witness.

programme.title: The Pasta Queen
programme.desc: Nadia continues her culinary journey to Campania, the heart of her family's pasta dynasty. Starting with a classic Caprese Salad, Nadia pays homage to the colors of the Italian flag. For the main course, she shares her Nonna-approved Eggplant Parmigiana. Join Nadia as she checks items off of her bucket list and embraces life's delightful surprises!

programme.title: The Pasta Queen
programme.desc: Nadia takes inspiration from family traditions and creates three new dishes with classic origins. Inspired by a visit to one of the oldest lemon groves in the Campania region, Nadia creates a lemon-infused pasta and limoncello cocktail using Sorrento’s famous citrus fruits. After serving up an ancient Italian fable, Nadia innovates one of her family’s favorite pasta bakes.

programme.title: The Pasta Queen
programme.desc: Nadia explores what makes the ultimate Italian comfort food, a journey that takes her from the Ancient Amphitheatre of Capua to her cousins’ family farm to harvest potatoes. With this knowledge, she makes two comforting classics: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina and Pastina in Brodo. These soothing dishes will make anyone’s troubles go away!
